autoBot.compare: Compares two values and returns true if equal or false if not equal
autoBot.senseAcelerometer:
Detects the tilt of the micro:bit card via the accelerometer
@returns
autoBot.senseLine: Detects the line through the five infrared sensors in front of the AutoBot, and returns straight, left, right or stop.
autoBot.senseUltrasonic: Send a ping and get the echo time (in microseconds) as a result
